import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DateTime } from 'luxon'; @Component({ selector: 'vex-quickpanel', templateUrl: './quickpanel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quickpanel.component.scss'] }) export class QuickpanelComponent implements OnInit { date = DateTime.local().toFormat('DD'); dayName = DateTime.local().toFormat('EEEE'); constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
